overview: Leng Yan (Yao Xingtong) is a female doctor studying in Cambridge. Her girlfriends are not ordinary people. There are Ukrainian models with angelic and devil figures, smart forensic women with high-strength kung fu, fortune-telling ladies who have a lot of money to spend their entire lives, and performances of peach blossoms. It is strange that although these girls have excellent conditions, they are always out of love and have repeatedly encountered rotten peach blossoms.
